facebookWorkplace.appId: Application ID from Facebook Workplace Integrations
facebookWorkplace.appSecret: Application Secret from Facebook Workplace Integrations
facebookWorkplace.pageAccessToken: Application Acces Token from Facebook Workplace Integrations
facebookWorkplace.verifyToken: Random token used to verify subscription on Webhooks

webapp.developmentKey: In development, specifify a key to enable HTTPS. Otherwise set to false.
webapp.developmentCert: In development, specifify a certificate to enable HTTPS. Otherwise set to false.
webapp.publicUrl: Public URL of the application, used mainly for callbacks. (eg. https://app.enablo.com)

workplaceAdmins: Workplace User ID's who can configure the integrations
workplaceGroups: Workplace Group ID's to listen to for updates
